keyMoments.title: Run's Debut and Immediate Defeat
keyMoments.description: Run, a guard posted at the passage to Building B, confronts Luffy during the escape. He is immediately defeated by a single Gear Second-enhanced kick from Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the power gap between Luffy post-timeskip and Caesar's regular guards. Run's instant defeat shows how far Luffy has come.

reveals.information: Guard of Building B passage in Caesar's laboratory

keyMoments.title: Tashigi Orders Cooperation with Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Hearing the alarm for the closing gate, Tashigi immediately orders her G-5 Marines to stop fighting the Straw Hats and work together to escape.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Tashigi's pragmatic leadership and her ability to prioritize her subordinates' lives over rivalry with pirates.
keyMoments.quote: Forget the Straw Hats! Everyone hurry to the gate!

keyMoments.title: Saved by Her Subordinates' Sacrifice
keyMoments.description: Several G-5 Marines forcibly throw Tashigi through the closing gate, sacrificing themselves to Shinokuni to ensure their captain's survival.
keyMoments.significance: This moment deeply affects Tashigi and shows the loyalty her subordinates have for her despite her strict command. It becomes a defining moment of her character.

keyMoments.title: Tashigi's Tears
keyMoments.description: Safe in Building B, Tashigi breaks down crying as she watches her subordinates who saved her being petrified by the poison gas, giving encouraging gestures as they die.
keyMoments.significance: The episode's titular moment. Shows the emotional weight of command and survival guilt. This moment deepens Tashigi's character significantly.

relationships.description: Tashigi commands the G-5 Marines and is deeply respected by them, as shown by their willingness to sacrifice their lives to save hers.

evolutionMoments.description: G-5 Marines sacrifice themselves to save Tashigi, demonstrating their deep loyalty to her.

keyMoments.title: Bakezo's Heroic Sacrifice
keyMoments.description: Bakezo is one of the G-5 Marines who stays behind to ensure Tashigi makes it through the gate, sacrificing himself to Shinokuni's petrification.
keyMoments.significance: Bakezo's sacrifice, along with the other G-5 Marines, becomes one of the most memorable moments of the Punk Hazard arc, showing the humanity of characters previously portrayed as rough criminals.

statusHistory.reason: Sacrificed himself to save Tashigi, petrified by Shinokuni gas
Restored after Law defeated Vergo and destroyed the SAD production room

relationships.description: Bakezo serves under Captain Tashigi and demonstrates ultimate loyalty by sacrificing his life to save hers.

evolutionMoments.description: Bakezo sacrifices himself to save Tashigi from Shinokuni.

keyMoments.title: Caesar Activates His Trap
keyMoments.description: Enraged by the escaped intruders, Caesar orders the passage between Buildings A and B sealed and commands Shinokuni to be released into Building A to kill everyone inside.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Caesar's cruelty and his willingness to kill indiscriminately, even risking his own subordinates. This decision leads directly to the deaths of multiple G-5 Marines.
keyMoments.quote: Close the passage between Buildings A and B! Let Shinokuni flow in and kill them all!

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Chopper Sneaks Out to Find the Children
keyMoments.description: After eavesdropping on Caesar's plans, Chopper sneaks away from the group to navigate the laboratory and find the captive children on his own.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Chopper's determination and courage to act independently to save the children, even in the face of great danger.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Defeats Run with Gear Second
keyMoments.description: Encountering the guard Run in Building A, Luffy uses a Gear Second-enhanced kick to instantly defeat him without breaking stride during the escape.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's post-timeskip power and how effortlessly he can deal with obstacles that would have been challenging before his training.
